legal_status: Limited Company (Division of a publicly listed US corporation)
goals__remit: Founded in 1980, Herbalife is a global nutrition company with the goal of helping people achieve healthy, active lives. Our products include protein shakes and snacks; vitamins and nutritional supplements; sports, energy and fitness drinks; and skin and hair care products. They are available exclusively to and through dedicated Independent Herbalife Members in more than 90 countries. The company has over 8,200 employees worldwide and its shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: HLF) with net sales of $4.5 billion in 2016.
